pitracBinary.description: Path to the main pitrac_lm executable

modelSearchPaths.description: Directories to search for AI models

modelFilePatterns.description: File patterns to match when searching for models

startupDelayCamera2.description: Seconds to wait after starting camera 2

startupWaitCamera2Ready.description: Seconds to wait for camera 2 to be ready

startupDelayCamera1.description: Seconds to wait after starting camera 1

shutdownGracePeriod.description: Seconds to wait for graceful shutdown

postKillDelay.description: Seconds to wait after force killing process

restartDelay.description: Seconds to wait between stop and start during restart

recentLogLines.description: Number of recent log lines to include in status

terminationSignal.description: Signal to send for graceful shutdown

baseImageLoggingDir.description: Legacy environment variable for backward compatibility

webserverShareDir.description: Legacy environment variable for backward compatibility

msgBrokerFullAddress.description: Legacy environment variable for backward compatibility

system.mode.description: Single Pi with dual cameras (most common) or Dual Pi setup (one camera per Pi)

system.camera_role.description: Which camera this Pi controls in dual Pi mode

gs_config.modes.kStartInPuttingMode.description: Start the system in putting mode for short game practice

gs_config.player.kGolferOrientation.description: Golfer handedness - affects ball detection and swing analysis (CLI parameter)

gs_config.player.kUsePracticeBalls.description: Enable for lightweight practice/foam balls - adjusts detection parameters (CLI parameter)

cameras.slot1.type.description: Type of camera connected to slot 1 (CAM0 port)

cameras.slot2.type.description: Type of camera connected to slot 2 (CAM1 port) - Only used in single Pi mode

cameras.slot2.lens.description: Lens type for camera 2 - Only used in single Pi mode

logging.level.description: Control the verbosity of system logging for PiTrac processes

options.trace: Trace - Most verbose, for deep debugging

gs_config.logging.kArtifactSaveLevel.description: Control how many diagnostic images are saved (CLI parameter)

options.final_results_only: Final Results Only - Save key images
options.all: All - Save all intermediate images (may slow system)

gs_config.debug.kShowDebugImages.description: Display debug/trace images on screen for troubleshooting (CLI parameter)

gs_config.debug.kWaitForKeyOnImages.description: Wait for keypress after showing debug images (CLI parameter)

gs_config.ball_identification.kDetection.description: Algorithm for detecting balls in flight

gs_config.ball_identification.kBallPlace.description: Algorithm for detecting ball placement on tee

gs_config.ball_identification.kONNXModel.description: Select YOLO model for AI-based ball detection

gs_config.cameras.kCamera2Gain.description: Brightness/gain setting for Camera 2 - Only used in single Pi mode

gs_config.cameras.kCamera1SearchCenterX.description: X coordinate for ball search center in Camera 1 (calibration parameter)

gs_config.cameras.kCamera1SearchCenterY.description: Y coordinate for ball search center in Camera 1 (calibration parameter)

gs_config.golf_simulator_interfaces.E6.k.description: IP address of E6 Connect simulator
Port number for E6 Connect simulator

gs_config.ball_identification.kUseCLAHEP.description: Enable Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization for better ball detection

gs_config.ball_position.kExpectedBallRad.description: Expected ball size at 40cm distance - critical for distance calculations

gs_config.strobing.kStandardBallSpeedSlo.description: Speed adjustment for standard golf balls (%)

gs_config.strobing.number_bits_for_fast_.description: Number of bits used for fast strobe on-pulse width. Controls the duration of the fast strobe pulse.

gs_config.strobing.number_bits_for_slow_.description: Number of bits used for slow strobe on-pulse width. Controls the duration of the slow strobe pulse.

gs_config.strobing.kPrimingPulseFPS.description: Frame rate for priming pulses sent to camera before capture. Used to stabilize camera exposure.

gs_config.logging.kLogIntermediateExposu.description: Save intermediate exposure images for debugging

gs_config.logging.kLogWebserverImagesToF.description: Save images for web server display

gs_config.logging.kLogDiagnosticImagesTo.description: Save diagnostic images with unique names (vs overwriting)

gs_config.ipc_interface.kWebServerShareD.description: Directory for web server shared files

gs_config.ipc_interface.kWebServerTomcat.description: Directory for Tomcat web server files

gs_config.ipc_interface.kWebActiveMQHost.description: ActiveMQ message broker address for dual camera mode

gs_config.ipc_interface.kRefreshTimeSeco.description: Web interface refresh interval in seconds

gs_config.golf_simulator_interfaces.kSki.description: Disable spin calculation (for putting-only or debugging)

gs_config.golf_simulator_interfaces.kWri.description: Save spin analysis data to CSV files

gs_config.ball_identification.kONNXConfi.description: Minimum confidence for AI ball detection

gs_config.ball_identification.kONNXNMSTh.description: Non-Maximum Suppression threshold for overlapping detections

gs_config.ball_identification.kSAHISlice.description: Height of slices for SAHI (Slicing Aided Hyper Inference)
Width of slices for SAHI (Slicing Aided Hyper Inference)

gs_config.ball_identification.kStrobedBa.description: Lower threshold for Canny edge detection
Upper threshold for Canny edge detection

cli.system_mode.description: System mode passed via command line (camera1, camera2, test modes)

cli.run_single_pi.description: Run both cameras on a single Pi (overrides system.mode setting)

gs_config.cameras.kCamera1HighFPSGain.description: Gain setting for Camera 1 in high FPS mode

gs_config.cameras.kCamera2ComparisonGain.description: Gain setting for Camera 2 in comparison mode

gs_config.cameras.kCamera2CalibrateOrLoc.description: Gain setting for Camera 2 during calibration or ball location

gs_config.cameras.kCamera2PuttingGain.description: Gain setting for Camera 2 in putting mode

gs_config.cameras.kCamera2PuttingContras.description: Contrast setting for Camera 2 in putting mode

gs_config.cameras.kCamera1StillShutterTi.description: Shutter time for Camera 1 still images in microseconds

gs_config.cameras.kCamera2StillShutterTi.description: Shutter time for Camera 2 still images in microseconds

gs_config.physical_constants.kBallRadius.description: Standard golf ball radius in meters

gs_config.ball_position.kMinMovedBallRad.description: Minimum radius ratio for moved ball detection

gs_config.ball_position.kMaxMovedBallRad.description: Maximum radius ratio for moved ball detection

gs_config.ball_position.kMaxRadiusRatio.description: Maximum general radius ratio for ball detection

gs_config.ball_position.kTeedBallSearchA.description: Radius ratio for teed ball search area mask

gs_config.ball_position.kMinBallRadiusPi.displayName: Min Ball Radius for Proximity Warning
gs_config.ball_position.kMinBallRadiusPi.description: Minimum ball radius in pixels to trigger proximity warning

gs_config.strobing.kBaudRateForSlowPulse.description: Serial baud rate for slow strobe pulses

gs_config.strobing.kBaudRatePulseMultipl.description: Multiplier for baud rate pulse timing

gs_config.strobing.kCam2SetupPeriodMilli.description: Setup period for Camera 2 in milliseconds

gs_config.strobing.kNumberPrimingPulses.description: Number of priming pulses before capture

gs_config.strobing.kPuttingStrobeDelayMs.description: Strobe delay for putting mode in milliseconds

gs_config.strobing.kPauseBeforeReadyForF.description: Pause before ready for final priming pulse in milliseconds

gs_config.strobing.kPauseBeforeSendingFi.description: Pause before sending final image trigger in milliseconds

gs_config.strobing.kPauseToSetUpInnoMake.description: Pause to set up InnoMaker external trigger in milliseconds
